page.title: 18HEALTH SERVICES/HEALTH CARE.
page.content: Lytham is served by a small NHS hospital which has normal in-patient facilities,X-Ray,Occupational Therapy, Physiotherapy and Chiropody.It caters for casualties but not emergencies.It has grown since opening in l87l from a Cottage Hospital by numerous extensions.Lytham has a large Senior Citizen population and there are many Rest and Nursing Homes.The average wekly cost for someone in a Lytham Nursing Home is approx. Â£l50. A well-equipped private physiotherapy Centre with hydrotherapy pool,saunas and gymnasium is run by Mr. Grant Smith.Patients recovering from ailments ranging from sports injuries to strokes are treated here. l50 patients are treated each week. Most are referred by Doctors but all treatment must be paid for.
